text: Marktoberdorf () is the capital of Ostallgäu in Swabia. Marktoberdorf is near Kempten, Füssen, known for the castle Neuschwanstein, Bad Wörishofen, and Schongau. The nearest larger city is Kaufbeuren, eleven kilometers away. ==Gallery== File:Balteratsried, kapel foto2 2009-06-05 12.19.JPG|Balteratsried, chapel. File:Kohlhunden, dorpszicht 2009-06-05 12.39.JPG|Kohlhunden, view to the village. File:Marktoberdorf, Pfarrkirche Sankt Martin foto2 2009-06-05 14.01.JPG|Marktoberdorf, church: Pfarrkirche Sankt Martin. ==Other websites== ==References== Category:Ostallgäu
title: Marktoberdorf
